message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $132 for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $128. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a fair profit. I can do $130 for the product. Is that a deal?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $128. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. I can do $129 for the product. This is my final offer, so if you're interested, now's the time to make a decision.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still at $128. I'm not willing to go above this price. Is there any flexibility?

I've already made a concession to $129, and you're still at $128. I'm not willing to go any lower than $129. This is my final offer. If you're interested, I'll sell it to you at this price. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
